input.sentences: this little guy was not ready to have his picture taken for his birthday .
my son made a great meal for everybody .
the little kids table was stocked full of goodies for all of them .
my granddaughter always knows when someone is about to take her picture .
i finally got a picture of all of them without them mugging for the camera .
output.sentences: The little guy was not ready to have his picture taken.
The young son of the cook was however ready to eat a meal.
The kids plates were already stocked and waiting for the kids on the table.
One of the cooks grand daughters turns around to have their picture taken.
Finally all the kids turn around mugging the camera for a picture.
